text: Surat Purva assembly constituency (સૂરત પૂર્વ વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Surat district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Surat City Taluka (Part) – Surat Municipal Corporation (Part) Ward No. – 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 30. ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 209 || 101620 || 98099 || 7 || 199726 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Ranjitbhai Gilitwala, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Ranjitbhai Gilitwala, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Arvind Rana, Bharatiya Janta Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Surat
title: Surat Purva
